word: AT NO TIME DID SHE PARTICIPATE IN OR CONDONE TEACHINGS WHICH CALLED FOR A SORT OF PLATONIC BROTHER AND SISTER RELATIONSHIP IN MARRIAGE. WHEN DEALING WITH SOME WHO PRESSED TEACHINGS OF THIS NATURE, ELLEN WHITE COUNSELED AGAINST URGING SUCH VIEWS. TO DWELL ON THEM, SHE WROTE, OPENED THE WAY FOR SATAN TO WORK "UPON THE IMAGINATION SO THAT IMPURITY" INSTEAD OF PURITY WOULD RESULT.--LT 103, 1894.
